languages.text: {n}Чтобы собрать картинку воедино, приходится заглянуть в корыто с водой. В отражении — знакомые черты. Что-то противоестественное выдрало вас из родной плоти и затащило в шкуру Мейв, фрейлины Руолдо. Времени, проведенного в конюшне, хватило, чтобы немного привыкнуть к новым конечностям. Но где же ваша собственная оболочка?{/n}

traits.locale_text: Полежали-отдохнули в сене, отправляемся дальше исследовать конюшню.

languages.text: {n}To complete the picture, you have no choice but to look into a nearby water trough at your reflection. You see familiar features: some unnatural force has dragged you out of your body and into that of Maive, Ruoldo's lady-in-waiting. Now that you have spent some time in this stable, you feel a little more accustomed to your new limbs. But where is your own mortal shell?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Чтобы собрать картинку воедино, приходится заглянуть в корыто с водой. В отражении — знакомые черты. Что-то противоестественное выдрало вас из родной плоти и затащило в шкуру Мейв, фрейлины Руолдо. Времени, проведенного в конюшне, хватило, чтобы немного привыкнуть к новым конечностям. Но где же ваша собственная оболочка?{/n}

You see familiar features: some unnatural force has dragged you out of your flesh and into the body of Maive, Ruoldo's lady-in-waiting. Now that you have spent some time in this stable, you feel a little more accustomed to your new limbs. But where is your own mortal shell?{/n}

You see familiar features: some unnatural force has dragged you out of your body and into that of Maive, Ruoldo's lady-in-waiting. Now that you have spent some time in this stable, you feel a little more accustomed to your new limbs. But where is your own mortal shell?{/n}

languages.text: {n}为了弄清楚发生了什么事情，你别无选择，只能通过附近的水槽看到了自己的倒影。你看到了熟悉的五官——某种超常的力量将你从自己的身躯中拖了出来，塞进了罗尔多的侍女梅芙的躯体里。你在这个马厩里已经呆了一段时间，也渐渐地适应了这幅新的身体，可你原本的身体究竟在什么地方？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To complete the picture, you have no choice but to look into a nearby water trough at your reflection. You see familiar features: some unnatural force has dragged you out of your body and into that of Maive, Ruoldo's lady-in-waiting. Now that you have spent some time in this stable, you feel a little more accustomed to your new limbs. But where is your own mortal shell?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}为了弄清楚发生了什么事情，你别无选择，只能通过附近的水槽看到了自己的倒影。你看到了熟悉的五官——某种超常的力量将你从自己的身躯中拖了出来，塞进了罗尔多的侍女梅芙的躯体里。你在这个马厩里已经呆了一段时间，也渐渐地适应了这幅新的身体，可你原本的身体究竟在什么地方？{/n}

languages.text: {n}A fin de completar la estampa, no te queda más remedio que mirar tu reflejo en un abrevadero cercano. Reconoces las facciones: alguna fuerza antinatural te ha arrancado de tu propio cuerpo y te ha introducido en el de Maive, la dama de honor de Ruoldo. Ahora que llevas un rato en el establo, empiezas a acostumbrarte a tus nuevas extremidades. ¿Pero dónde está tu propia envoltura mortal?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To complete the picture, you have no choice but to look into a nearby water trough at your reflection. You see familiar features: some unnatural force has dragged you out of your body and into that of Maive, Ruoldo's lady-in-waiting. Now that you have spent some time in this stable, you feel a little more accustomed to your new limbs. But where is your own mortal shell?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A fin de completar la estampa, no te queda más remedio que mirar tu reflejo en un abrevadero cercano. Reconoces las facciones: alguna fuerza antinatural te ha arrancado de tu propio cuerpo y te ha introducido en el de Maive, la dama de honor de Ruoldo. Ahora que llevas un rato en el establo, empiezas a acostumbrarte a tus nuevas extremidades. ¿Pero dónde está tu propia envoltura mortal?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Resmi tamamlamak için yakındaki bir su yalağındaki yansımana bakmaktan başka seçeneğin yok. Tanıdık yüz hatlarını görüyorsun: Doğaüstü bir güç seni bedeninden çekip Ruoldo'nun nedimesi Maive'in bedenine sokmuş. Ahırda zaman geçirdikçe yeni uzuvlarına biraz daha alışmış hissediyorsun. Peki kendi ölümlü bedenin nerede?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To complete the picture, you have no choice but to look into a nearby water trough at your reflection. You see familiar features: some unnatural force has dragged you out of your body and into that of Maive, Ruoldo's lady-in-waiting. Now that you have spent some time in this stable, you feel a little more accustomed to your new limbs. But where is your own mortal shell?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Resmi tamamlamak için yakındaki bir su yalağındaki yansımana bakmaktan başka seçeneğin yok. Tanıdık yüz hatlarını görüyorsun: Doğaüstü bir güç seni bedeninden çekip Ruoldo'nun nedimesi Maive'in bedenine sokmuş. Ahırda zaman geçirdikçe yeni uzuvlarına biraz daha alışmış hissediyorsun. Peki kendi ölümlü bedenin nerede?{/n}

languages.text: {n}完璧な自分の像を見るには、近くの水辺に行って反射する自分を見るしかない。あなたは見慣れた特徴を目にする―不思議な力によってあなたはあなたの体から引き剥がされ、ルオルドの侍女であるメイヴの体に入った。この馬房でしばらく過ごして、新しい体に少し慣れる。しかし、あなたの抜け殻はどこに？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To complete the picture, you have no choice but to look into a nearby water trough at your reflection. You see familiar features: some unnatural force has dragged you out of your body and into that of Maive, Ruoldo's lady-in-waiting. Now that you have spent some time in this stable, you feel a little more accustomed to your new limbs. But where is your own mortal shell?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}完璧な自分の像を見るには、近くの水辺に行って反射する自分を見るしかない。あなたは見慣れた特徴を目にする―不思議な力によってあなたはあなたの体から引き剥がされ、ルオルドの侍女であるメイヴの体に入った。この馬房でしばらく過ごして、新しい体に少し慣れる。しかし、あなたの抜け殻はどこに？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pour ne rien arranger, vous n'avez d'autre choix que de vous servir d'un abreuvoir pour examiner votre reflet. Les traits que vous y voyez vous sont familiers : une force surnaturelle vous a transféré dans le corps de Maive, la dame d'honneur de Ruoldo. Maintenant que vous avez passé un peu de temps dans cette écurie, vous vous êtes {rt_mf|habitué|habituée} à vos nouveaux membres. Mais où peut bien se trouver votre propre enveloppe corporelle ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To complete the picture, you have no choice but to look into a nearby water trough at your reflection. You see familiar features: some unnatural force has dragged you out of your body and into that of Maive, Ruoldo's lady-in-waiting. Now that you have spent some time in this stable, you feel a little more accustomed to your new limbs. But where is your own mortal shell?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pour ne rien arranger, vous n'avez d'autre choix que de vous servir d'un abreuvoir pour examiner votre reflet. Les traits que vous y voyez vous sont familiers : une force surnaturelle vous a transféré dans le corps de Maive, la dame d'honneur de Ruoldo. Maintenant que vous avez passé un peu de temps dans cette écurie, vous vous êtes {rt_mf|habitué|habituée} à vos nouveaux membres. Mais où peut bien se trouver votre propre enveloppe corporelle ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Um das Bild zu vervollständigen, musst du in einem nahen Wassertrog wohl oder übel dein Spiegelbild betrachten. Du siehst ein vertrautes Gesicht: Irgendeine unnatürliche Kraft hat dich in den Körper von Maive verpflanzt ... Ruoldos Kammerzofe. Nachdem du mittlerweile einige Zeit in diesem Stall verbracht hast, gewöhnst du dich langsam an deine neuen Gliedmaßen. Aber wo ist deine eigene sterbliche Hülle?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To complete the picture, you have no choice but to look into a nearby water trough at your reflection. You see familiar features: some unnatural force has dragged you out of your body and into that of Maive, Ruoldo's lady-in-waiting. Now that you have spent some time in this stable, you feel a little more accustomed to your new limbs. But where is your own mortal shell?{/n}
